attributes.action: All Sports should be treated equaly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sport England clearly has what it considers its priority sports
often pushing other sports to the back of the list. Why should
sports such as Football and cricket be in the top section of
Sport England? It is wrong all sports have a value to those
taking part and no one sport should be put above another.
Angling has more people fishing the football as playing
football yet football is in a higher position WHY. We the tax
payers want a level playing field which gives equality to all
sports large and small.
We want to see all sport treated equaly
